title: Taste of Bhakti
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Indian, International, Organic, Buffet, Take-out
description: The Bhakti Center's latest cafe, began food service since Oct 2013 (was Bhakti Buffet). It's buffet style, located on the first floor, with free Wi-Fi. Soups, sandwiches, and salad bar are available throughout the day. Has gluten-free options. A gift shop sells eastern clothing, meditation japa beads, home decor, jewerly, books on Vedic philosophy, musical instruments, and music CDs.
